scripts.build: docusaurus build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const indexPath=path.join(__dirname,'build','search-index.json');try{if(fs.existsSync(indexPath)){console.log('[search-index] found',path.relative(__dirname,indexPath));}else{console.warn('[search-index] missing build/search-index.json');}}catch(err){console.warn('[search-index] check failed:',err.message);}"
